items.sentence: The Jacksons invited me to have dinner with them.
I was really scared that Tom was going to hit me.
Tom built an underground shelter in his backyard.
I think we\'d better wait another thirty minutes.
Tom signed the contract after his lawyer read it.
Tom told Mary to stay at home until she got well.
There is an urgent need for better communication.
I don\'t often have an opportunity to use French.
I don\'t really know how else I can explain that.
I don\'t really want to eat Chinese food tonight.
